crossorigin="anonymous"></script><meta name="apple-itunes-app" content="app-id=388491656"><style type="text/css">#ensModalWrapper {
    display: none !important;
}

.ens-consent-banner {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    background: #fff;
    padding: 10px 0;
    border-top: 1px solid #eeeeee7d;
}

.ens-consent-banner .ens-content {
    max-width: 1180px;
    margin: auto;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    font-family: 'Whitney-Book';
}

.ens-consent-banner .ens-copy {
    color: #0b1f66;
    flex: 1.9;
    padding-left: 5%;
}

.ens-consent-banner .ens-copy.sm {
    display: none;
}

.ens-consent-banner .ens-buttons {
    flex: 1;
    font-family: 'Whitney-Semibold';
}

.ens-consent-banner .ens-buttons button {
    border: .125rem solid #0b1f66;
    background-color: white;
    color: #0b1f66;
    padding: 5px 10px;
    letter-spacing: 0.02rem;
}

.ens-buttons button:nth-child(1), .ens-buttons button:nth-child(2) {
    margin-right: 5px;
}

.ens-consent-banner .ens-buttons button:hover {
    cursor: pointer;
}

.ens-consent-banner .ens-settings:hover, .ens-consent-banner .ens-reject:hover, .ens-consent-banner .ens-accept:hover  {
    color: white;
    background-color: #0b1f66;
}

@media (max-width: 991px) {
    .ens-consent-banner .ens-copy.sm {
        display: block;
        padding: 10px 20px;
    }
    
    .ens-consent-banner .ens-copy.lg {
        display: none;
    }
    
    .ens-consent-banner .ens-content {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    
    .ens-consent-banner .ens-buttons {
        margin-top: 10px;
    }
}

#ensModalWrapper {
    top: 0px !important;
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 2000000001;
    width: 100vw;
    height: 100vh;
    background: rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.5);
}

.ensModal {
    background-color: #fff;
    margin-top: 3%;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    font-family: 'Whitney-Book';
    width: 98vw;
    max-width: 600px;
    color: #0B1F66;
    max-height: 98vh;
}

.ensModal > .consentDescription {
    padding: 15px 25px 0px 25px;
}

.ensTitle {
    background-color: #10172E;
    color: white;
    padding: 18.5px 24px;
    font-size: 18px;
    font-family: 'Whitney-Medium';
}

.ensClose {
    float: right;
}

.ensClose:before {
    width: 2px;
    height: 2px;
    content: "\E91E";
    color: #8996a9;
    font-family: icomoon !important;
    font-size: 14px;
    margin-right: 10px;
}

.ensClose:hover:before {
    cursor: pointer;
}

.ensToggleRowWrapper > * {
    padding: 0px 25px 0px 25px;
    display: none;   
}

.ensToggleRow:nth-child(2), .ensToggleRow.display {
    display: block !important;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.ensToggleLabel {
    display: flex !important;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    flex-direction: row;
    align-items: flex-start;
    font-family: 'Whitney-Semibold';
}

.ensCheckbox {
    display: none;
}

.ensToggleRow .card {
    border: none !important;
    margin: 3px 0px 5px 10px;
}

.ensToggleRow .switch {
  display: inline-block;
  height: 18px;
  position: relative;
  width: 34px;
}

.ensToggleRow .switch input {
  display:none;
}

.ensToggleRow .toggle {
  background-color: #ccc;
  bottom: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
  left: 0;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
  transition: .4s;
  border-radius: 34px;
}

.ensToggleRow .toggle:before {
  background-color: #fff;
  bottom: 4px;
  content: "";
  height: 10px;
  left: 4px;
  position: absolute;
  transition: .4s;
  width: 10px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

.ensToggleRow input:checked + span + .toggle {
  background-color: #0B1F66;
}

.ensToggleRow input:checked + span + .toggle:before {
  transform: translateX(16px);
}

.ensExpand {
    color: #4470c3 !important;
}

.ensExpand:hover {
    cursor: pointer;
    text-decoration: underline !important;
}

.ensButtons {
    margin-top: 20px;
    height: 55px;
    padding: 0px 25px;
}

#ensCancel {
    display: none;
}

#ensSave {
    color: white;
    border: none;
    background-color: #e51937;
    font-family: 'Whitney-Semibold';
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    width: 100px;
    height: 40px;
    float: right;
}

#ensSave:hover {
    cursor: pointer;
    background-color: #98012e;
}</style><style type="text/css"></style><style>.idp-error-tooltip__wrapper[_ngcontent-home-c65]{position:absolute;right:0;margin:var(--idp-tooltip-margin) auto 0         <script type="text/javascript" src="https://www.delta.com/resources/d313d0974763120c0d0265eb98f27f913a30d77a1d98e" async=""></script><script>
$(document).ready(function(){

    var path = window.location.pathname;
    var tier = "";
    var smtPresent = false;

$('img.cq-rte-anchor').each(function() {
	var anchorId = $(this).attr("_rte_a_id_repl");

	$(this).replaceWith('<a id="'+anchorId +'"></a>')
});
    
    if(path.indexOf(".smt-") > 0){
        /* Can not guarantee that SkyMiles selector will be last selector, 
         so must parse out and account for other possible selectors. */
        var tmpPath = path.substring(path.indexOf(".smt-") + 1, path.length);
        var tier = tmpPath.substring(0, tmpPath.indexOf("."));
        smtPresent = true;
    }
    /* Only look for rich-text editor areas, leave all other links alone. */
    $("div.rteDelta a[href]").attr('href', function(){
        var link = this.getAttribute('href');
        if( link.indexOf("http") > -1 || link.indexOf(".html") == -1){
//            $(this).attr("data-extlink","ext12");
        } else {
        /*  problem. */
            if(smtPresent){
                var front = link.substring(0, link.lastIndexOf("."));
                var extension = link.substring(link.lastIndexOf("."), link.length);
                /* add the '.' back since it was removed when looking for the tier */
                extension = "." + tier + extension;
                this.href = front + extension;
            }
        }
    });
    
});
</script>
